chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
q: nat
Hq: 0 < q
r: nat
Hr: r = power q 2
Hr': 2 <= r
b: nat
a: nat
i: nat

Goal:
a ≲ b * power i r -> {a' : nat | a = a' * power i r /\ a' ≲ b}

Premises:
Notation power := (mscal mul 1)
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
nat_meet_powers_eq : forall i a b : nat, a * power i r ⇣ (b * power i r) = a ⇣ b * power i r
binary_power_split : forall i a : nat, {u : nat & {v : nat | a = u ⇡ v * power i r /\ (forall k : nat, u ⇣ (k * power i r) = 0)}}
nat_euclid_pow2_lb : forall n r q : nat, r < power n 2 -> ⟬ r + q * power n 2 ⟭ ≂ ⟬ r ⟭ ↑ lb_shift n ⟬ q ⟭
sum_powers_euclid : forall (r n : nat) (f e : nat -> nat), (forall j : nat, j < n -> e 1 <= e (S j)) -> ∑ (S n) (fun i : nat => f i * power (e i) r) = f 0 * power (e 0) r + ∑ n (fun i : nat => f (S i) * power (e (S i) - e 1) r) * power (e 1) r
euclid : forall n d : nat, d <> 0 -> {q : nat & {r : nat | n = q * d + r /\ r < d}}
sum_powers_bound : forall (r n : nat) (f e : nat -> nat), r <> 0 -> (forall i : nat, i < n -> f i < r) -> (forall i j : nat, i < j -> e i < e j) -> ∑ n (fun i : nat => f i * power (e i) r) < power (e n) r
rel_iter.is_digit = fun c q i y : nat => y < q /\ (exists a b : nat, c = (a * q + y) * power i q + b /\ b < power i q) : nat -> nat -> nat -> nat -> Prop Arguments rel_iter.is_digit (_ _ _ _)%nat_scope
power_decomp_unique' : forall p : nat, 2 <= p -> forall (n : nat) (f a b : nat -> nat), (forall i j : nat, i < j < n -> f i < f j) -> (forall i : nat, i < n -> a i < p) -> (forall i : nat, i < n -> b i < p) -> ∑ n (fun i : nat => a i * power (f i) p) = ∑ n (fun i : nat => b i * power (f i) p) -> forall i : nat, i < n -> a i = b i
power_decomp_unique : forall p : nat, 2 <= p -> forall (n : nat) (f a b : nat -> nat), (forall i j : nat, i < j < n -> f i < f j) -> (forall i : nat, i < n -> a i < p) -> (forall i : nat, i < n -> b i < p) -> ∑ n (fun i : nat => a i * power (f i) p) = ∑ n (fun i : nat => b i * power (f i) p) -> forall i : nat, i < n -> a i = b i
binary_le_mult_power2_inv : forall m x q : nat, m ≲ x * power q 2 -> m <> 0 -> {y : nat | m = y * power q 2 /\ y <> 0 /\ y ≲ x}
power_decomp_factor : forall p : nat, 2 <= p -> forall (n : nat) (f a : nat -> nat), (forall i : nat, 0 < i < S n -> f 0 < f i) -> ∑ (S n) (fun i : nat => a i * power (f i) p) = ∑ n (fun i : nat => a (S i) * power (f (S i) - f 0 - 1) p) * power (S (f 0)) p + a 0 * power (f 0) p
Newton_nat : forall a b n : nat, power n (a + b) = ∑ (S n) (fun i : nat => binomial.binomial n i * power (n - i) a * power i b)
power_decomp_lt : forall p : nat, 2 <= p -> forall (n : nat) (f a : nat -> nat) (q : nat), (forall i j : nat, i < j < n -> f i < f j) -> (forall i : nat, i < n -> f i < q) -> (forall i : nat, i < n -> a i < p) -> ∑ n (fun i : nat => a i * power (f i) p) < power q p
binary_le_joins_inv : forall (m n : nat) f, m ≲ msum nat_join 0 n f -> {k : nat & {g : nat -> nat & {h : nat -> nat | m = msum nat_join 0 k g /\ k <= n /\ (forall i : nat, i < k -> g i <> 0 /\ g i ≲ f (h i)) /\ (forall i : nat, i < k -> h i < n) /\ (forall i j : nat, i < j < k -> h i < h j)}}}
Newton_nat_S : forall a n : nat, power n (1 + a) = ∑ (S n) (fun i : nat => binomial.binomial n i * power i a)
power_plus : forall p a b : nat, power (a + b) p = power a p * power b p
power_decomp_is_digit : forall p : nat, 2 <= p -> forall (n : nat) (a f : nat -> nat), (forall i j : nat, i < j < n -> f i < f j) -> (forall i : nat, i < n -> a i < p) -> forall i : nat, i < n -> rel_iter.is_digit (∑ n (fun i0 : nat => a i0 * power (f i0) p)) p (f i) (a i)
power_mult : forall p a b : nat, power (a * b) p = power a (power b p)
binary_le_joins_inv' : forall (m n : nat) f, m ≲ msum nat_join 0 n f -> {g : nat -> nat | m = msum nat_join 0 n g /\ (forall i : nat, i < n -> g i ≲ f i)}
nat_join_euclid2 : forall q r1 d1 r2 d2 : nat, r1 < power q 2 -> r2 < power q 2 -> r1 + d1 * power q 2 ⇡ (r2 + d2 * power q 2) = r1 ⇡ r2 + (d1 ⇡ d2) * power q 2
nat_meet_euclid_power_2 : forall q r1 d1 r2 d2 : nat, r1 < power q 2 -> r2 < power q 2 -> (r1 + d1 * power q 2) ⇣ (r2 + d2 * power q 2) = r1 ⇣ r2 + d1 ⇣ d2 * power q 2
power_2_inj : forall i j : nat, power i 2 = power j 2 -> i = j
sum_power_lt : forall (k n : nat) f, k <> 0 -> (forall i : nat, i < n -> f i < k) -> ∑ n (fun i : nat => f i * power i k) < power n k
nat_join_mono : forall a b u v : nat, a ≲ b -> u ≲ v -> a ⇡ u ≲ b ⇡ v
nat_join_mult_power2 : forall q x y : nat, x * power q 2 ⇡ y * power q 2 = (x ⇡ y) * power q 2

```coq
intros a_b H.
destruct (binary_power_split i a) as [u [v [Hu Hv]]].
assert (Hu' : a = u * power i r).
{ rewrite Hu. auto. }
assert (Hv' : forall k : nat, u ⇣ (k * power i r) = 0).
{ intros k. rewrite Hv. auto. }
destruct (euclid u b) as [q [r [Hqr Hru]]].
assert (Hrq : r < q * power i r).
{ rewrite Hqr. auto. }
assert (Hrb : r < b * power i r).
{ rewrite Hqr. apply Hru. }
exists q.
split.
- rewrite Hu'. rewrite Hqr. auto.
- apply binary_le_mult_power2_inv.
  + rewrite Hu'. auto.
  + intro Hz. rewrite Hz in *. discriminate.
  + auto.
Qed.

original: intros a_b H. destruct (binary_power_split i a) as [u [v [Hu Hv]]]. assert (Hu' : a = u * power i r). { rewrite Hu. auto. } assert (Hv' : forall k : nat, u ⇣ (k * power i r) = 0). { intros k. rewrite Hv. auto. } destruct (euclid u b) as [q [r [Hqr Hru]]]. assert (Hrq : r < q * power i r). { rewrite Hqr. auto. } assert (Hrb : r < b * power i r). { rewrite Hqr. apply Hru. } exists q. split. - rewrite Hu'. rewrite Hqr. auto. - apply binary_le_mult_power2_inv. + rewrite Hu'. auto. + intro Hz. rewrite Hz in *. discriminate. + auto.
